name: Literary Classics
description: Memorable lines from the greatest works of literature throughout history.
author: Quips Editorial

quotes.content: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
It is not our abilities that show what we truly are. It is our choices.
quotes.source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quotes.content: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
To be, or not to be: that is the question.
